name: Baldi's Basics Multiplayer Prototype
description:
Welcome to the Baldi's Basics Multiplayer Prototype Test Version! This is a version of BBIEAL with semi-functional multiplayer, meaning you can create a game, give someone the name of the server you created, and then play with them! Due to being an early prototype though, a lot of things don't function correctly, and I'm planning on remaking the game from a new unity project with multiplayer functionality from the start. Anyways, I hope you enjoy playing this baldi's basics multiplayer prototype, and a lot of testing went into this project to even get it working in the first place!
